derivation.yuyuan_name: Spanish, from Latin festum, (plural) festa (see feast)

entry.tran: (尤指西班牙或拉丁美洲的)宗教节日，狂欢节日
entry.def: A fiesta is a time of public entertainment and parties, usually on a special religious holiday, especially in Spain or Latin America.
